1.どこに 行きますか？|<break>: Where do you want to go?<break>

2.住宅村の中で 『空いている土地をさがす』から|指定した地区の 空いてる土地だけを:
In the Housing Village, you can use the|"Search Vacant Land" function to search for|vacant land in a specified district. After|
|selecting the district and the size of the|land you want to search, select "Search from|all streets" to see the list of available|
|lots. If you select a lot in the list that|you want to buy, you can go to the district|of that lot... If you refresh the page with|
|"View Next 50" or "View Previous 50", the|land that has been sold will be deleted from|the list...
